com.nathanpaternoster.services

Interface UserDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserDAOImplPostgres

    public interface UserDAO
    Data access object for the users ("users") table

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Insert a new user into the database

      boolean emailIsAvailable(java.lang.String email)
      Check if an email address is already registered to an existing user

    • Method Detail

      • addNewUser

        int addNewUser(User newUser)
        Insert a new user into the database
        Parameters:
        newUser - The user to insert
        Returns:
        The generated userID or -1 if user wasn't inserted

      • updateUser

        boolean updateUser(User updatedUser)
        Update the information of an existing user
        Parameters:
        updatedUser - The user to update
        Returns:
        True if the specified user was successfully found and updated, false otherwise

      • authenticateUser

        User authenticateUser(int userID,
                      java.lang.String password)
        Query the database with login credentials
        Parameters:
        userID - The user's id
        password - The user's password
        Returns:
        A new user object if found, null otherwise

      • getUser

        User getUser(int userID)
        Search the database for a user with the given id
        Parameters:
        userID - The user's id
        Returns:
        A new user object if found, null otherwise

      • getAllEmployees

        java.util.List<Employee> getAllEmployees()
        Query the database for all employees
        Returns:
        A list of all employees

      • emailIsAvailable

        boolean emailIsAvailable(java.lang.String email)
        Check if an email address is already registered to an existing user
        Parameters:
        email - Email address to check
        Returns:
        True if the email address is not currently assigned to an existing user, otherwise false
